tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE image_annotations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    annotation_text TEXT,
    bounding_box_x INT,
    bounding_box_y INT,
    bounding_box_width INT,
    bounding_box_height INT
);

CREATE TABLE ImageAnnotations (
    annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    annotation TEXT,
    bounding_box_x INT,
    bounding_box_y INT,
    bounding_box_width INT,
    bounding_box_height INT
);

CREATE TABLE ObjectLocalization (
    localization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id INT,
    image_id INT,
    localization_data TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE bounding_boxes (
  bounding_box_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  annotation_id UUID NOT NULL,
  x1 INT NOT NULL,
  y1 INT NOT NULL,
  x2 INT NOT NULL,
  y2 INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE bounding_boxes (
    box_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID REFERENCES image_annotations(image_id),
    x_min INT,
    y_min INT,
    x_max INT,
    y_max INT
);

CREATE TABLE bounding_boxes (
    bounding_box_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID,
    x_min INTEGER,
    y_min INTEGER,
    x_max INTEGER,
    y_max INTEGER
);
